headline: Bio-Techne Corporation (TECH): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Bio-Techne Corporation (TECH) on scuttleblurb’s Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on TECH. Bio-Techne Corporation (TECH)’s share was trading at $47.93 as of 28th May. TECH’s trailing and forward P/E were 57.75 and 22.03 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Bio-Techne has built a diverse and complex […]
